Summary: I'm a computer engineering student specializing in Big Data analytics, eager to apply my skills and collaborate with talented teams at exceptional organizations. I believe in leveraging my capabilities to become a valuable asset and contribute to the organization's growth.

Education.Institution: SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Ramapuram

Internships.Description: Throughout my internship, I dedicatedly cleaned and curated over 100 datasets, prioritizing data integrity to ensure reliability for subsequent analysis. Leveraging powerful visualization tools, I transformed raw data into compelling visuals, facilitating better comprehension and informed decision-making processes. This hands-on experience significantly bolstered my proficiency in data cleaning and visualization, equipping me with the technical skills necessary for real-world data analysis roles.

Projects.Title: Road Lane Detection System
Projects.Description: Developed deep learning models for road lane detection, emphasizing skills in data preprocessing and model optimization. Acquired practical experience in handling diverse datasets, implementing deep learning algorithms, and interpreting model outcomes.

Projects.Title: Real Estate Price Prediction
Projects.Description: Implemented regression models for real estate price prediction, refining skills in data preprocessing and feature engineering. Gained practical experience handling large datasets, implementing machine learning algorithms, and interpreting results deepening understanding of regression techniques in predicting property prices.

Projects.Title: Sales Insights Dashboard
Projects.Description: Working on the Sales Insights Project has significantly enhanced my data science skills, particularly in data collection, cleaning, and exploratory analysis. I learned to create impactful visualizations and build predictive models to forecast sales trends. The project taught me how to translate complex data into actionable business insights and recommendations.
